title: [Large-Scale] Flipped Learning-Based Strategies for Supporting Mastery in Mathematics

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of mathematics curriculum content and basic instructional methods, with flipped learning experience (optional)
context.additional_context: Emphasizing the competency of designing flipped mathematics lessons for pre-service teachers. Utilizing smartphone-based learning materials and formative assessments

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more self-directed mathematics concept mastery strategies in a flipped learning environment.
Learners can accurately perform problem-solving processes using peer feedback over 80% of the time.
Learners can establish a self-assessment plan at least twice weekly using smartphone-based learning materials.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
